text: Barry Levinson (born April 6, 1942) is an American screenwriter, Academy Award winning movie director, actor, and producer of movie and television. His most famous movies are Diner, The Natural, Good Morning, Vietnam, Rain Man, Bugsy, and Wag the Dog.New York Times ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Academy Award winning directors Category:Actors from Baltimore Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:American Emmy Award winners Category:Movie directors from Maryland Category:Movie producers from Maryland Category:Screenwriters from Maryland Category:Writers from Baltimore
title: Barry Levinson
